item-type:create.description: Create a new custom item type
examples: <%= config.bin %> item-type create --name "Bug" --plural "bugs" --identifier uuid --statuses open,in-progress,closed --default-status open --priority-levels 3 --features display-number,status,priority,move,duplicate
<%= config.bin %> item-type create --name "Task" --plural "tasks" --identifier slug --statuses todo,doing,done --default-status todo --features status,priority

default-status.description: Default status for new items (must be in statuses list)
default-status.name: default-status

features.description: Comma-separated features (display-number, status, priority, assets, org-sync, move, duplicate)
features.name: features
